lines.text:
[to the police officers]
You can't do this to Granny Goodheart, I have a doll named after me. They're putting my name on lunch boxes in Taiwan as we speak.
That's the way it works, today you're making a ghost costume, tomorrow you'll be sewing a wedding dress.
Does your book have any pictures in it?
Oh yes they're very beautiful, except this one, my daughter decided to repaint the cottage.
The Good Lord put these teeth in and He's the one who decides when they come out.
